SEARCH
Module se1.bestellsystem

Package system

package system
Package with system component classes for the se1.bestellsystem.

The package provides public interfaces of system components and access points to references of system components.

Version:
"1.0.0-SNAPSHOT-F12-Refactoring"
Author:
"sgraupner"
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    system.impl
     
  • Interfaces
    Class
    Description
    Calculator
    Calculator is a singleton system component that performs calculations.
    DataBuilder
    DataBuilder is used to create and customize (build) datamodel objects of classes Customer, Article and Order.
    DataBuilder.OrdersFactory
    Creating objects of type Order requires access to Customer and Article objects, which is provided by respective repositories passed to the factory lambda in buildOrders(OrdersFactory factory);.
    DataFactory<T,ID>
    DataFactory creates datamodel objects of classes of type T that use an ID of type ID.
    DataStore
    DataStore is a singleton system component that stores collections of datamodel objects of classes Customer, Article and Order.
    Formatter
    Formatter is a singleton system component that performs formatting operations.
    IoC
    Interface of an "Inversion-of-Control" (IoC) container, which creates and contains system component objects such as Calculator, DataStore, Formatter and Printer.
    Printer
    Printer is a singleton system component that prints collections of datamodel objects into a StringBuilder in a table-format.
    Repository<T,ID>
    Interface to access a collection of objects of a datamodel class of type T in a DataStore.
